name: positive-intentions-chat
description: Chat is a self-hosted messaging app with user accounts, channels, and real-time communication using WebSockets. It focuses on privacy and supports theming and file transfers through a modern UI.
features: Real-time messaging: Send and receive messages instantly using WebSocket connections for live communication.
Channel support: Create public or private channels for topic-based discussions and team collaboration.
User accounts: Register and manage user accounts with authentication and profile customization.
File transfers: Share files and images directly in conversations with drag-and-drop support.
Theme customization: Personalize the interface with custom themes and color schemes.
Message history: Access complete conversation history with search and filtering capabilities.
Notifications: Receive alerts for new messages, mentions, and channel activity.
Privacy focused: Self-hosted deployment ensures complete control over conversation data and user privacy.
Emoji support: Express yourself with emoji reactions and inline emoji in messages.
User presence: See who's online and active in real-time with presence indicators.
Direct messaging: Send private one-on-one messages outside of public channels.
Message formatting: Format messages with Markdown for rich text, code blocks, and links.
